title: crock pot coconut lentil curry
directions: Add the dried brown lentils, ginger, cumin, coriander, turmeric, if using the cayenne, crushed tomatoes, garlic, onion, and 3 cups of water in your crock pot. Put the lid on and set the timer for 4 hours on high or 8 hours on low.
Stir the coconut milk, 2 teaspoons of sea salt, cilantro and cherry tomatoes into the curry. Taste and add extra salt to taste.
Serve on its own or over a bed of rice.
ingredients: A few handfuls of cherry tomatoes
